# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/winBackOffers | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/winBackOffers ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers)

-  GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/winBackOffers 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/winBackOffers

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/subscriptions/{id}/relationships/winBackOffers
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[SubscriptionWinBackOffersLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/subscriptionwinbackofferslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#see-also)

### [Endpoints](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-relationships-winbackoffers#Endpoints)

[Creating and configuring win-back offers](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/creating-and-configuring-win-back-offers)Configure win-back offers for your auto-renewable subscriptions with the App Store Connect API.[`List win-back offers`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-subscriptions-_id_-winbackoffers)List all win-back offers for a specific subscription.[`Read win-back offer information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-winbackoffers-_id_)Read details about a specific win-back offer.[`List win-back offer prices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-winbackoffers-_id_-prices)List all prices for specific win-back offers.[`GET /v1/winBackOffers/{id}/relationships/prices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-winbackoffers-_id_-relationships-prices)[`Create a win-back offer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-winbackoffers)Create a win-back offer for a specific subscription.[`Modify a win-back offer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-winbackoffers-_id_)Edit details for a specific win-back offer.[`Delete a win-back offer`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-winbackoffers-_id_)Remove a win-back offer for a specific subscription.
